info.title: JioSaavn API
info.description: An unofficial wrapper for the JioSaavn API.

get.description: Returns the OpenAPI 3.1 JSON document for this API.
Interactive API reference powered by Scalar.

parameters.name: mini
parameters.description: If true, returns a smaller payload (when supported).

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description: If true, returns the raw JioSaavn response (bypasses this API's payload formatting).

parameters.name: camel
parameters.description: If provided, converts JSON response keys to camelCase (post-processing middleware).

get.description: Fetch song details by `id` (supports comma-separated IDs) or by `link`/`token`.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Song ID(s). You can pass comma-separated IDs.

parameters.name: mini
parameters.description: If true, returns a smaller payload (when supported).
